articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.title: Why Scientists Think There May Be Parts Of An Ancient Planet Inside Earth - HuffPost UK
articles.description: It all stems from giant yet mysterious structures under Africa and the Pacific.
articles.content:
There are two unidentified "blobs" underneath the Earth's surface
There are two giant but mysterious structures underneath the Earths surface, which just might be part of an ancient planet.
